snippet.title: Rhapsody in Blue: Late Intermediate Piano , Sheet
snippet.description: While condensed and simplified, this edition retains all the grandeur and sparkle of the original. Students will feel inspired and confident as they perform this sassy, jazzy piece of classical music.
